contents: Article 21 (Exclusion of referees) Referees are excluded from being assigned referees for the relevant game if any of the following applies. Revised on February 10, 2023. The referee is or was a relative (referring to a relative under Article 777 of the Civil Act) of a player, coach, or player manager (hereinafter referred to as ‘game participant’) participating in the game. Case 2. When the referee belongs to the same team as the game participant or worked on the same team ② Deleted on February 10, 2023.
